reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 100/99: GAS WITHOUT CHARGE OR AT A REDUCED RATE
reg_info.reg_name_text: GAS WITHOUT CHARGE OR AT A REDUCED RATE

content.content: 1. (1) No person shall use or consume any gas that was supplied without charge or at a reduced rate under an agreement entered into with a gas distributor for which the supplying of gas without charge or at a reduced rate is a consideration.  O. Reg. 100/99, s. 1 (1). (2) Subsection (1) does not apply to an agreement or renewal of an agreement made before January 1, 1955.  O. Reg. 100/99, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) No person shall use or consume any gas that was supplied without charge or at a reduced rate under an agreement entered into with a gas distributor for which the supplying of gas without charge or at a reduced rate is a consideration.  O. Reg. 100/99, s. 1 (1).

(2) Subsection (1) does not apply to an agreement or renewal of an agreement made before January 1, 1955.  O. Reg. 100/99, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 100/99, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 100/99, s. 2.
